topic.title: Request for Subtitle Notification
topic.body: When you open a Video, i can download it in SD HD Etc, but I would like to know if it has "Hard Coded Subs" "Subs come with it (Like a txt file)" Or No Subs" So i can instead of downloading the movie and it comes with Hard Coded Subs.

1604065461_mirrored_tapnikita_github.body: Used latest Repo fresh copy. i see the CC Search, but the torrents dont state "Hard Coded" or not
